copy.ballHelpDesktop: Pull back on your character with the MOUSE to aim and release to shoot.
copy.ballHelpMobile: PULL BACK on your character to aim and release to shoot.
copy.pogoHelpDesktop: Hold the SPACE BAR to charge up and release it to jump.
copy.pogoHelpMobile: TAP and HOLD to charge up and release to jump.
copy.ringHelpDesktop: Use the LEFT and RIGHT keys to steer.
copy.ringHelpMobile: TAP and HOLD the buttons to steer.
